Container.Name: Mixwave - Dashboard
Container.Overview: Mixwave is a self-hostable platform that aims to simplify the complexities of video delivery. Transcode and package your media for online streaming with simple API calls and sane defaults, or craft dynamic HLS playlists on the fly with bumpers, ads and filters.
Container.Category: MediaApp:Music MediaApp:Video MediaServer:Music MediaServer:Video Cloud: Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: music video hosting transcode server streaming download playlists queue Stitcher ads advertisements sponsors
Container.Requires: This is the frontend for the Mixin suite. It requires other Mixin containers to be running.

Config.Name: Public API Endpoint
Config.Description: Publicly accessible URL for Mixin API container. Replace with your IP or domain.

Config.Name: Public Stitcher Endpoint
Config.Description: Publicly accessible URL for Mixin Stitcher container. Replace with your IP or domain.
